CustomField.description: This field is used for VVS (Vista Value Selling) Closing Plan
CustomField.formula: IF(Quantitative_Deal_Strength_Score__c >=00.85, "Why would we lose?", IF(Quantitative_Deal_Strength_Score__c >=00.68, "Incremental work required, few specific gaps to close identified", IF(Quantitative_Deal_Strength_Score__c >=00.33, "Significant work required, many gaps-to-close", "Why are we in this deal?" )))
CustomField.label: Qualitative Score
